abstract: Minnesota Vikings quarterback Teddy Bridgewater will likely miss entire season due to major knee injuries sustained in practice.
lead_paragraph: Bridgewater, in his third year in the league, was expected to take some major steps forward this season.
snippet: Bridgewater, in his third year in the league, was expected to take some major steps forward this season....

headline.main: Vikings Lose Quarterback Teddy Bridgewater for the Season
headline.print_headline: Vikings Quarterback Lost for Year With Knee Injury
